headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: The content type of the request. Allowed value: "application/json" .

parameters.name: assets
parameters.description: Assets you want to add to the Asset Group. Max size is 200.

parameters.name: asset_id
parameters.description: Asset ID. When the asset type ( asset_type ) is ADVERTISER , this is the advertiser ID.

parameters.name: asset_type
parameters.description: Asset type. Currently, the only supported type is ADVERTISER . You don't have to specify this field since ADVERTISER is used by default.

parameters.name: members
parameters.description: Business Center members you want to grant access to your Asset Group. Max size is 50.

parameters.name: asset_roles
parameters.description: The roles you want to assign to the member according to the asset type. Key: Asset type. Enum value: ADVERTISER . Value: Assigned role. Enum values: ADVERTISER_ROLE_ADMIN : Manage ad accounts: Control ad account settings, finances and permissions. Manage campaigns: Create and edit ads. View performance: Access reports and view ads. ADVERTISER_ROLE_OPERATOR : Manage campaigns: Create and edit ads. View performance: Access reports and view ads. ADVERTISER_ROLE_ANALYST : View performance: Access reports and view ads. Default value: "ADVERTISER: ADVERTISER_ROLE_ADMIN" .
